FAQÂ¶

Why does |project| call executables instead of, e.g. compiling LAMMPS as a library and running everything in Python, wouldn’t that be faster?

Yes, it would almost certainly be faster! This is tentatively planned for the future. On a first pass, ClusterGB was optimized for ease of use rather than computational efficiency, and having access to a copy of LAMMPS is a lot more likely than having access to LAMMPS compiled as a library.
